Package com.example.networkmeup.domain

Class Job

java.lang.Object
com.example.networkmeup.domain.Job
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Job extends Object implements Serializable
The Job class represents a job listing, containing details and requirements for a job position.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Job

      public Job(String title, String description)
      Constructor to create a Job object with a specified title and description. Initializes lists for applications, required education, work experience, and language knowledge.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the job.
      description - The description of the job.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the title or description is null.

  • Method Details

    • acceptCV

      public boolean acceptCV(CV cv)
      Determines if a CV meets the requirements of this job.
      Parameters:
      cv - The CV to be evaluated against the job requirements.
      Returns:
      true if the CV meets all the job requirements, false otherwise.
